patterns: I am a contractor and referred someone who was hired.Am I eligible for a referral bonus?
I made a referral of somwone being a contractor who was hired.Am I eligible for a referral bonus?
responses: No

patterns: How long after my referral joins the company will I get the bonus?
When will i get the bonus after my referral joins the company?
after how many days my referral joins the company will I get the bonus?
responses: On a referral being hired, the referrer is credited with a referral bonus of INR Twenty Thousand (INR 20000/-) in two (2) equal instalments. The first instalment is credited along with the payroll of the month when the referee joins and the second instalment is credited along with the payroll of the month when the referee is confirmed employment with Abzooba.If the referred candidate joins within 20th of a payroll cycle (20th included), the referral bonus will get credited in the account of the referrer in the same cycle. In the event when the referred candidate joins after 20th of the payroll cycle, the referral bonus will get credited in the account of the referrer in the following cycle.

While making requests for referral, it is necessary to attach the resume of the candidate being referred.

patterns: Who is eligible for referral bonus?
Am I eligible for referral bonus?
responses: 1.Temporary contractual associates and former associates are not eligible for the referral program. 2.Spouses or Children of existing associates are exempted from the referral program. 3.Fresher profiles and profile of Interns are welcome, but they are exempted from the referral program. 4.When a referred intern working with the organization is hired in direct payrolls of the organization, the referrer will be eligible to receive referral bonus. 5.Referrer on referring a candidate cannot be part of the interview panel for hiring the candidate. 6.The Reporting Managers, Project Managers, COE and Delivery Heads will not be a part of the referral policy when their referees join their team. 7.This policy is also not applicable in cases where the reporting of a candidate is pre-decided and the reporting manager/project manager refers the candidate being aware of the situation, or in a scenario where the referee on joining the organization, is made to report the associate or project manager, who had referred him/her.
